text: @senatemajldr @KellyannePolls So Matt Gaetz was acting like it was a crisis when he wore a gas mask to a vote in congress to mock people’s fear of the coronavirus...Trump was acting like it was a crisis when he said it was a hoax,that it was no worse than the flu and that it would magically vanish in April.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
